title: In case of non-residential occupier the area to be given in the reconstructed building shall be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building
clause_text: In case of non-residential occupier the area to be given in the reconstructed building shall be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building.
section: (3) 7.6.1 (3) Redevelopment of Multi-Dwelling Buildings of Co-Operative Housing Societies / Apartments

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In case of non-residential occupier the area to be given in the reconstructed building shall be equivalent to the area occupied in the old building.
